core

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Transform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Invalidatable

    public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
implements Invalidatable
    Stores a GameObject's transformation data. It stores the position, the rotation, the scale, both absolute and relative values. Also stores the model matrix, the inverse model matrix and the direction vectors. If the GameObject doesn't have parent, it's relative and absolute values are the same. All rotation values are stored in degrees.
    See Also:
    GameObject, GameObject.setTransform(Transform transform)
